mapper.select: SELECT to_char(T.I_SPDNO,'0000000') || '/SPD/' || Romawi(to_char(S.D_SPD_CETAK,'MM')) || to_char(S.D_SPD_CETAK,'/YYYY') AS I_SPDNO FROM TMSPD T LEFT JOIN TMSPDCETAK S ON S.I_ID = T.I_ID WHERE T.I_ID = #{idspd}

SELECT DISTINCT trskpd.i_id, trskpd.C_SKPD, trskpd.N_SKPD FROM trskpd, tmdpabtl, trbas WHERE trskpd.I_ID = tmdpabtl.I_IDSKPD AND trbas.I_ID = tmdpabtl.I_IDBAS AND SUBSTR (trbas.c_akun, 1, 5) IN ('5.1.1', '5.1.2', '5.1.8') AND tmdpabtl.C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} ORDER BY trskpd.C_SKPD

SELECT DISTINCT trskpd.i_id, trskpd.C_SKPD, trskpd.N_SKPD FROM trskpd, tmdpabtl, trbas WHERE trskpd.I_ID = tmdpabtl.I_IDSKPD AND trbas.I_ID = tmdpabtl.I_IDBAS AND SUBSTR (trbas.c_akun, 1, 5) IN ('5.1.1', '5.1.2', '5.1.8') AND tmdpabtl.C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND trskpd.i_id = #{id} ORDER BY trskpd.C_SKPD

SELECT XXX.I_IDSKPD, TRSKPD.N_SKPD, SUM (BTL_APBD) BTL_APBD, SUM (BTL_APBDP) BTL_APBDP, SUM (SPD) SPD, SUM (BTL_APBD - SPD) SELISIH_APBD, SUM (BTL_APBDP - SPD) SELISIH_APBDP FROM (SELECT I_IDSKPD,(V_ANGG_DPA) BTL_APBD, (V_ANGG_TAPD) BTL_APBDP, 0 SPD FROM TMDPABTL, TRBAS WHERE C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} and I_IDSKPD = #{idskpd} AND trbas.I_ID = tmdpabtl.I_IDBAS AND SUBSTR (trbas.c_akun, 1, 5) IN ('5.1.1', '5.1.2', '5.1.8') UNION ALL SELECT I_IDSKPD, 0 BTL_DPA, 0 BTL_APBDP, (V_SPD) SPD FROM VW_SPDBTL WHERE C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} and I_IDSKPD = #{idskpd} ) XXX, TRSKPD WHERE XXX.I_IDSKPD = TRSKPD.I_ID GROUP BY XXX.I_IDSKPD, TRSKPD.N_SKPD ORDER BY 1

SELECT SUM (tmdpabtl.v_angg_tapd) AS pagu FROM tmdpabtl, trbas, trskpd WHERE ( (trbas.i_id = tmdpabtl.i_idbas) AND (trskpd.i_id = tmdpabtl.i_idskpd)) AND SUBSTR (trbas.c_akun, 1, 5) IN ('5.1.1', '5.1.2', '5.1.8') AND tmdpabtl.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND tmdpabtl.i_idskpd = #{idskpd} GROUP BY tmdpabtl.i_idskpd

SELECT SUM (v_spd) AS tmpVar FROM tmspd, tmspdrincibtl, tmspdcetak WHERE tmspd.I_ID = tmspdrincibtl.I_IDSPD AND tmspd.I_ID = tmspdcetak.I_ID AND tmspd.c_jenis = '1' AND tmspd.C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND tmspd.I_IDSKPD = #{idskpd}

SELECT I_IDSKPD AS "skpd.idSkpd", C_ANGG_TAHUN AS tahunAnggaran, D_SPDNO AS tglSpd, I_IDSPD AS idSpd, I_SPDNO AS noSpd, STATUS AS status, V_SPD AS nilaiSpd FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT A.I_IDSKPD, A.C_ANGG_TAHUN, TO_DATE(A.D_SPDNO,'DD-MM-YYYY') as D_SPDNO, A.I_IDSPD, A.I_SPDNO, A.STATUS, A.V_SPD FROM VW_SPDBTL_GRID A WHERE upper(STATUS) != 'VALIDASI' AND c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND i_idskpd = #{idskpd} ORDER BY
A.I_SPDNO
A.D_SPDNO
A.V_SPD
A.I_IDSPD
desc
asc
) a) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset}

SELECT I_IDSKPD AS "skpd.idSkpd", C_ANGG_TAHUN AS tahunAnggaran, D_SPDNO AS tglSpd, I_IDSPD AS idSpd, I_SPDNO AS noSpd, STATUS AS status, V_SPD AS nilaiSpd FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT A.I_IDSKPD, A.C_ANGG_TAHUN, TO_DATE(A.D_SPDNO,'DD-MM-YYYY') as D_SPDNO, A.I_IDSPD, A.I_SPDNO, A.STATUS, A.V_SPD FROM VW_SPD_BTL_APBDP A WHERE c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND i_idskpd = #{idskpd} ORDER BY
A.I_SPDNO
A.D_SPDNO
A.V_SPD
A.I_IDSPD
desc
asc
) a) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset}

SELECT IDBTL AS idBtl, I_IDBAS AS idAkun, c_akun AS kodeAkun, N_AKUN AS namaAkun, nilaiAnggaranSPDSudahAda, nilaiAnggaranTAPD, nilaiAnggaranSPDSisa, nilaiAnggaranSPDBaru FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT XXX.I_IDSKPD, IDBTL, TRSKPD.N_SKPD, I_IDBAS, c_akun, trbas.N_AKUN, SUM (SPD_sdhada) as nilaiAnggaranSPDSudahAda, SUM (BTL) AS nilaiAnggaranTAPD, SUM (BTL - SPD_sdhada) AS nilaiAnggaranSPDSisa, SUM (BTL - SPD_sdhada) AS nilaiAnggaranSPDBaru FROM (SELECT I_IDSKPD, I_ID IDBTL, I_IDBAS, (V_ANGG_TAPD) BTL, 0 SPD_sdhada FROM TMDPABTL WHERE C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND TMDPABTL.I_IDskpd = #{idskpd} UNION ALL SELECT I_IDSKPD, VW_SPDBTL.I_IDBTL IDBTL, I_IDBAS, 0 BTL, (V_SPD) SPD_sdhada FROM VW_SPDBTL WHERE C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDskpd = #{idskpd} ) XXX, TRSKPD, trbas WHERE XXX.I_IDSKPD = TRSKPD.I_ID AND XXX.I_IDBAS = trbas.I_ID and substr(trbas.c_akun,1,5) in ('5.1.1','5.1.2','5.1.8') GROUP BY XXX.I_IDSKPD, IDBTL, TRSKPD.N_SKPD, I_IDBAS, c_akun, N_AKUN ORDER BY 1, 4) a) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset}

SELECT IDBTL AS idBtl ,I_IDBAS AS idAkun ,c_akun AS kodeAkun ,N_AKUN AS namaAkun ,nilaiAnggaranSPDSudahAda ,nilaiAnggaranTAPD ,nilaiAnggaranSPDSisa ,nilaiAnggaranSPDBaru ,nilaiAnggaranSPDMurni,nilaiSPDYangSudahDiserap FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn ,a.* FROM ( SELECT XXX.I_IDSKPD ,IDBTL ,TRSKPD.N_SKPD ,I_IDBAS ,c_akun ,trbas.N_AKUN ,SUM(SPD_sdhada) AS nilaiAnggaranSPDSudahAda ,SUM(BTL) AS nilaiAnggaranTAPD ,SUM(BTL - SPD_sdhada) AS nilaiAnggaranSPDSisa ,SUM(spd) AS nilaiAnggaranSPDEdit ,SUM(BTL - SPD_sdhada - spd) AS KOREKSI ,SUM(V_ANGG_DPA) AS nilaiAnggaranSPDMurni ,NVL(SUM(V_SPP),0) AS nilaiSPDYangSudahDiserap FROM ( SELECT I_IDSKPD ,TMDPABTL.I_ID IDBTL ,I_IDBAS ,(V_ANGG_TAPD) BTL ,0 SPD_sdhada ,0 spd ,(V_ANGG_DPA) V_ANGG_DPA,O AS V_SPP FROM TMDPABTL ,TRBAS WHERE C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND TMDPABTL.I_IDskpd = #{idskpd} AND TMDPABTL.I_IDBAS = trbas.I_ID AND substr(trbas.c_akun, 1, 5) IN ( '5.1.1' ,'5.1.2' ,'5.1.8' )
UNION ALL
SELECT I_IDSKPD ,VW_SPDBTL.I_IDBTL IDBTL ,I_IDBAS ,0 BTL ,(V_SPD) SPD_sdhada ,0 spd,0 AS V_ANGG_DPA, (SELECT SUM (NVL(V_SPP,0)) FROM tmspprincibtl btl INNER JOIN tmspp spp ON SPP.I_ID = BTL.I_IDSPP WHERE btl.I_IDBAS = VW_SPDBTL.I_IDBAS AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDSPD = BTL.I_IDSPD AND SPP.C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} ) AS V_SPP FROM VW_SPDBTL WHERE C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDSPD != #{idspd} AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDskpd = #{idskpd} AND VW_SPDBTL.C_SPD_STATUS = 'P' UNION ALL
SELECT I_IDSKPD ,VW_SPDBTL.I_IDBTL IDBTL ,I_IDBAS ,0 BTL ,0 SPD_sdhada ,(V_SPD) SPD,0 AS V_ANGG_DPA, (SELECT SUM (NVL(V_SPP,0)) FROM tmspprincibtl btl INNER JOIN tmspp spp ON SPP.I_ID = BTL.I_IDSPP WHERE btl.I_IDBAS = VW_SPDBTL.I_IDBAS AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDSPD = BTL.I_IDSPD AND SPP.C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} ) AS V_SPP FROM VW_SPDBTL WHERE C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDSPD = #{idspd} AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDskpd = #{idskpd} AND VW_SPDBTL.C_SPD_STATUS = 'P' ) XXX ,TRSKPD ,trbas WHERE XXX.I_IDSKPD = TRSKPD.I_ID AND XXX.I_IDBAS = trbas.I_ID AND substr(trbas.c_akun, 1, 5) IN ( '5.1.1' ,'5.1.2' ,'5.1.8' ) GROUP BY XXX.I_IDSKPD ,IDBTL ,TRSKPD.N_SKPD ,I_IDBAS ,c_akun ,N_AKUN ORDER BY 1 ,4 ) a ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset}

SELECT IDBTL AS idBtl, I_IDBAS AS idAkun, c_akun AS kodeAkun, N_AKUN AS namaAkun, nilaiAnggaranSPDSudahAda, nilaiAnggaranTAPD, nilaiAnggaranSPDSisa, nilaiAnggaranSPDEdit FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT XXX.I_IDSKPD, IDBTL, TRSKPD.N_SKPD, I_IDBAS, c_akun, trbas.N_AKUN, SUM (SPD_sdhada) AS nilaiAnggaranSPDSudahAda, SUM (BTL) AS nilaiAnggaranTAPD, SUM (BTL - SPD_sdhada) AS nilaiAnggaranSPDSisa, SUM (spd) AS nilaiAnggaranSPDEdit FROM (SELECT I_IDSKPD, TMDPABTL.I_ID IDBTL, I_IDBAS, (V_ANGG_TAPD) BTL, 0 SPD_sdhada, 0 spd FROM TMDPABTL,TRBAS WHERE C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND TMDPABTL.I_IDskpd = #{idskpd} AND TMDPABTL.I_IDBAS = trbas.I_ID and substr(trbas.c_akun,1,5) in ('5.1.1','5.1.2','5.1.8') UNION ALL SELECT I_IDSKPD, VW_SPDBTL.I_IDBTL IDBTL, I_IDBAS, 0 BTL, (V_SPD) SPD_sdhada, 0 spd FROM VW_SPDBTL WHERE C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDSPD != #{idspd} AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDskpd = #{idskpd} UNION ALL SELECT I_IDSKPD, VW_SPDBTL.I_IDBTL IDBTL, I_IDBAS, 0 BTL, 0 SPD_sdhada, (V_SPD) SPD FROM VW_SPDBTL WHERE C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDSPD = #{idspd} AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDskpd = #{idskpd} ) XXX, TRSKPD, trbas WHERE XXX.I_IDSKPD = TRSKPD.I_ID AND XXX.I_IDBAS = trbas.I_ID and substr(trbas.c_akun,1,5) in ('5.1.1','5.1.2','5.1.8') GROUP BY XXX.I_IDSKPD, IDBTL, TRSKPD.N_SKPD, I_IDBAS, c_akun, N_AKUN ORDER BY 1, 4) a) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset}

SELECT IDBTL AS idBtl ,I_IDBAS AS idAkun ,c_akun AS kodeAkun ,N_AKUN AS namaAkun ,nilaiAnggaranSPDSudahAda ,nilaiAnggaranTAPD ,nilaiAnggaranSPDSisa ,nilaiAnggaranSPDEdit ,nilaiAnggaranSPDMurni ,nilaiSPDYangSudahDiserap FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn ,a.* FROM ( SELECT XXX.I_IDSKPD ,IDBTL ,TRSKPD.N_SKPD ,I_IDBAS ,c_akun ,trbas.N_AKUN ,SUM(SPD_sdhada) AS nilaiAnggaranSPDSudahAda ,SUM(BTL) AS nilaiAnggaranTAPD ,SUM(BTL - SPD_sdhada) AS nilaiAnggaranSPDSisa ,SUM(spd) AS nilaiAnggaranSPDEdit ,SUM(BTL - SPD_sdhada - spd) AS KOREKSI ,SUM(V_ANGG_DPA) AS nilaiAnggaranSPDMurni ,NVL(SUM(V_SPP), 0) AS nilaiSPDYangSudahDiserap FROM ( SELECT I_IDSKPD ,TMDPABTL.I_ID IDBTL ,I_IDBAS ,(V_ANGG_TAPD) BTL ,0 SPD_sdhada ,0 spd ,(V_ANGG_DPA) V_ANGG_DPA ,0 AS V_SPP FROM TMDPABTL ,TRBAS WHERE C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND TMDPABTL.I_IDskpd = #{idskpd} AND TMDPABTL.I_IDBAS = trbas.I_ID AND substr(trbas.c_akun, 1, 5) IN ( '5.1.1' ,'5.1.2' ,'5.1.8' ) and exists (select 1 from tmspdrincibtl, tmspd where tmspdrincibtl.i_idspd = tmspd.i_id and C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND tmspdrincibtl.I_IDSPD = #{idspd} AND tmspd.I_IDskpd = #{idskpd} AND tmspdrincibtl.C_SPD_STATUS = 'P' and TMDPABTL.i_idbas = tmspdrincibtl.i_idbas )
UNION ALL
SELECT I_IDSKPD ,VW_SPDBTL.I_IDBTL IDBTL ,I_IDBAS ,0 BTL ,(V_SPD) SPD_sdhada ,0 spd ,0 AS V_ANGG_DPA ,0 AS V_SPP FROM VW_SPDBTL WHERE C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDSPD != #{idspd} AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDskpd = #{idskpd} and exists (select 1 from tmspdrincibtl, tmspd where tmspdrincibtl.i_idspd = tmspd.i_id and C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND tmspdrincibtl.I_IDSPD = #{idspd} AND tmspd.I_IDskpd = #{idskpd} AND tmspdrincibtl.C_SPD_STATUS = 'P' and VW_SPDBTL.i_idbas = tmspdrincibtl.i_idbas )
UNION ALL SELECT I_IDSKPD ,VW_SPDBTL.I_IDBTL IDBTL ,I_IDBAS ,0 BTL ,0 SPD_sdhada ,(V_SPD) SPD ,0 AS V_ANGG_DPA ,0 AS V_SPP FROM VW_SPDBTL WHERE C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDSPD = #{idspd} AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDskpd = #{idskpd} AND VW_SPDBTL.C_SPD_STATUS = 'P'
UNION ALL SELECT I_IDSKPD ,VW_SPDBTL.I_IDBTL IDBTL ,I_IDBAS ,0 BTL ,0 SPD_sdhada ,0 SPD ,0 AS V_ANGG_DPA ,( SELECT SUM(NVL(V_SPP, 0)) FROM tmspprincibtl btl INNER JOIN tmspp spp ON SPP.I_ID = BTL.I_IDSPP WHERE btl.I_IDBAS = VW_SPDBTL.I_IDBAS AND BTL.I_IDSPD = #{idspd} AND SPP.I_IDSKPD = VW_SPDBTL.I_IDSKPD AND SPP.C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} ) AS V_SPP FROM VW_SPDBTL WHERE C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDSPD = #{idspd} AND VW_SPDBTL.I_IDskpd = #{idskpd} AND VW_SPDBTL.C_SPD_STATUS = 'P'
) XXX ,TRSKPD ,trbas WHERE XXX.I_IDSKPD = TRSKPD.I_ID AND XXX.I_IDBAS = trbas.I_ID AND substr(trbas.c_akun, 1, 5) IN ( '5.1.1' ,'5.1.2' ,'5.1.8' ) GROUP BY XXX.I_IDSKPD ,IDBTL ,TRSKPD.N_SKPD ,I_IDBAS ,c_akun ,N_AKUN ORDER BY 1 ,4 ) a )
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset}

SELECT I_ID AS idPejabatPPKD, C_AKTIF AS isAktif, I_NIP AS nip, I_NRK AS nrk, N_PEG AS namaPegawai, N_JABATAN AS namaJabatan, I_PGUN_REKAM AS idEntry, D_PGUN_REKAM AS tglEntry, I_PGUN_UBAH AS idEdit, D_PGUN_UBAH AS tglEdit FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT T.I_ID, T.C_AKTIF, T.I_NIP, T.I_NRK, T.N_PEG, T.N_JABATAN, T.I_PGUN_REKAM, T.D_PGUN_REKAM, T.I_PGUN_UBAH, T.D_PGUN_UBAH FROM TRDOKTTD T WHERE ( T.C_DOK = #{kodeDok} AND ( #{nilaispd} >= T.V_DOK_MIN AND #{nilaispd} <= T.V_DOK_MAX )) OR T.C_DOK = 'ALL' ORDER BY
I_NIP
I_NRK
N_PEG
N_JABATAN
T.I_ID
DESC
ASC
) a) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT( T.I_ID)) FROM TRDOKTTD T WHERE ( T.C_DOK = #{kodeDok} AND ( #{nilaispd} >= T.V_DOK_MIN AND #{nilaispd} <= T.V_DOK_MAX ) ) OR T.C_DOK = 'ALL'
SELECT SEQ_TMSPD.nextval from dual
SELECT A.I_IDSKPD, A.C_ANGG_TAHUN, A.D_SPDNO, A.I_IDSPD, A.I_SPDNO, A.STATUS, A.V_SPD FROM VW_SPD_BTL_APBDP A WHERE A.I_IDSPD = #{param}
mapper.update: UPDATE TMSPD SET C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahunAnggaran} , I_SPDNO = #{noSpd}, C_JENIS = #{jenis}, D_SPDNO = #{tglSpd} , I_IDSKPD = #{skpd.idSkpd}, C_BULAN_AWAL = #{bulanAwal}, C_BULAN_AKHIR = #{bulanAkhir}, E_SPD = REPLACE ( REPLACE (REPLACE (#{uraian} , CHR(13), ' '), CHR(10), ' '), CHR(9), ' ' ) WHERE I_ID = #{idSpd}
mapper.select: SELECT T.I_ID, T.C_ANGG_TAHUN, T.I_SPDNO, T.D_SPDNO, T.I_IDSKPD, T.C_BULAN_AWAL||'/'||T.C_ANGG_TAHUN as C_BULAN_AWAL, T.C_BULAN_AKHIR||'/'||T.C_ANGG_TAHUN as C_BULAN_AKHIR, T.E_SPD, S.C_SKPD||'/'||S.N_SKPD as N_SKPD,S.C_SKPD FROM TMSPD T LEFT JOIN TRSKPD S ON S.I_ID = T.I_IDSKPD WHERE T.I_ID = #{param}

SELECT SUM(COUNT(DISTINCT XXX.I_IDBAS)) AS banyak FROM ( SELECT I_IDSKPD ,I_IDBAS ,(V_ANGG_TAPD) BTL ,0 SPD FROM TMDPABTL t WHERE C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} and exists (select 1 from tmspdrincibtl, tmspd where tmspdrincibtl.i_idspd = tmspd.i_id and C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND tmspdrincibtl.I_IDSPD = #{idspd} AND tmspd.I_IDskpd = #{idskpd} AND tmspdrincibtl.C_SPD_STATUS = 'P' and t.i_idbas = tmspdrincibtl.i_idbas )
UNION ALL
SELECT I_IDSKPD ,I_IDBAS ,0 BTL ,(V_SPD) SPD FROM VW_SPDBTL v WHERE C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} AND V.I_IDSPD != #{idspd} AND v.C_SPD_STATUS = 'P' )
XXX ,TRSKPD ,trbas WHERE XXX.I_IDSKPD = TRSKPD.I_ID AND TRSKPD.I_ID = #{idskpd} AND XXX.I_IDBAS = trbas.I_ID GROUP BY XXX.I_IDSKPD ,TRSKPD.N_SKPD ,I_IDBAS ,c_akun ,N_AKUN
SELECT COUNT (T.I_ID) FROM TMSPDRINCIBTL T WHERE T.I_IDSPD = #{idSpd} AND I_IDBTL = #{idBtl}
mapper.update: UPDATE TMSPDRINCIBTL SET V_SPD = #{nilaiAnggaranSPDCurrent}, I_PGUN_UBAH = #{idEdit}, D_PGUN_UBAH = #{tglEdit} WHERE I_IDSPD = #{idSpd} AND I_IDBTL = #{idBtl}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TMSPDSAH (I_ID, I_PGUN_REKAM, D_PGUN_REKAM, D_SPD_SAH, V_SPD) VALUES (#{idspd},#{userid},#{tglentry} ,#{tglentry},#{nilaispd})
mapper.update:
UPDATE TMSPDSAH SET C_SPD_STATUS = #{stat},
V_SPD = (SELECT NVL (SUM (v_SPD), 0) FROM tmspdrincibtl WHERE i_IDSPD = #{idspd} ),
V_SPD = (SELECT NVL (SUM (v_SPD), 0) FROM tmspdrincibl WHERE i_IDSPD = #{idspd} ),
V_SPD = (SELECT NVL (SUM (v_SPD), 0) FROM tmspdrincibtlbantuan WHERE i_IDSPD = #{idspd} ),
V_SPD = (SELECT NVL (SUM (v_SPD), 0) FROM tmspdrincibiaya WHERE i_IDSPD = #{idspd} ),
D_PGUN_REKAM = #{tglentry} wHERE I_ID = #{idspd}
UPDATE TMSPDRINCIBTL SET C_SPD_STATUS = '2', D_PGUN_REKAM = #{tglentry} wHERE I_IDSPD = #{idspd} and C_SPD_STATUS = 'P'
UPDATE TMSPDRINCIBL SET C_SPD_STATUS = '2', D_PGUN_REKAM = #{tglentry} wHERE I_IDSPD = #{idspd} and C_SPD_STATUS = 'P'
UPDATE TMSPDRINCIBTLBANTUAN SET C_SPD_STATUS = '2', D_PGUN_REKAM = #{tglentry} wHERE I_IDSPD = #{idspd} and C_SPD_STATUS = 'P'
UPDATE TMSPDRINCIBIAYA SET C_SPD_STATUS = '2', D_PGUN_REKAM = #{tglentry} wHERE I_IDSPD = #{idspd} and C_SPD_STATUS = 'P'

UPDATE TMSPDCETAK SET C_SPD_STATUS = #{stat},
A_SPDFILE_PDF = #{filepdf}, E_PERATURAN_SPD1 = #{p1}, E_PERATURAN_SPD2 = #{p2}, E_PERATURAN_SPD5 = #{p5}, E_PERATURAN_SPD6 = #{p6} wHERE I_ID = #{idspd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TMSPDCETAK ( I_ID, I_PGUN_REKAM, D_PGUN_REKAM, A_JASPER_FILE, A_SPDFILE_PDF, I_NIP, N_PEG, N_JABATAN ,C_STATUS_CETAK,C_SPD_STATUS,I_NRK, I_NIP_PA, I_NRK_PA, N_PA, I_NIP_PK, I_NRK_PK,N_PK,D_SPD_CETAK) VALUES (#{idspd},#{userid},#{tglentry} , #{filejasper},#{filepdf},#{nip},#{namapeg},#{namajabatan},'1',#{stat}, #{nrkPegawai},#{nipPA},#{nrkPA},#{namaPA},#{nipPK},#{nrkPK},#{namaPK},#{tglc} )
mapper.delete: delete TMSPDRINCIBTL WHERE I_IDBAS = #{idAkun} AND I_IDSPD = #{idSpd}
mapper.select: SELECT T.D_REKAM as tglRekam, T.D_APPROVE as tglApprove, T.D_CETAK as tglCetak, T.D_SAH as tglSah FROM TRHARIKERJA T WHERE C_DOK = 'SPD' AND D_HARI_KERJA = #{value}

/* Formatted on 2015/06/12 15:15 (Formatter Plus v4.8.8) */ SELECT c_akun, n_akun, v_angg_tapd, v_spd, persen_spd, v_sp2d, persen_sp2d, persen_sp2d_tapd FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT SUBSTR (xxxx.c_akun, 1, 3) c_akun, b.n_akun, SUM (v_angg_tapd) v_angg_tapd, SUM (v_spd) v_spd, TO_CHAR (SUM (v_spd) / SUM (v_angg_tapd) * 100, 99.99 ) AS persen_spd, SUM (v_sp2d) v_sp2d, TO_CHAR (SUM (v_sp2d) / SUM (v_spd) * 100, 99.99 ) AS persen_sp2d, TO_CHAR (SUM (v_sp2d) / SUM (v_angg_tapd) * 100, 99.99 ) AS persen_sp2d_tapd FROM (SELECT '5.2' AS c_akun, v_angg_tapd, 0 v_spd, 0 v_sp2d FROM tmdpabl WHERE c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} UNION ALL SELECT '5.1' AS c_akun, v_angg_tapd, 0 v_spd, 0 v_sp2d FROM tmdpabtl WHERE c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} UNION ALL SELECT '6.2' AS c_akun, v_angg_tapd, 0 v_spd, 0 v_sp2d FROM tmdpabiaya, trbas WHERE c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND c_akun LIKE '6.2' UNION ALL SELECT '5.1' AS c_akun, 0 v_angg_tapd, (a.v_spd) AS v_spd, 0 v_sp2d FROM tmspdrincibtl a, tmspdsah, tmspd WHERE a.i_idspd = tmspdsah.i_id AND tmspd.i_id = tmspdsah.i_id AND tmspd.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} UNION ALL SELECT '5.1' AS c_akun, 0 v_angg_tapd, (a.v_spd) AS v_spd, 0 v_sp2d FROM tmspdrincibtlbantuan a, tmspdsah, tmspd WHERE a.i_idspd = tmspdsah.i_id AND tmspd.i_id = tmspdsah.i_id AND tmspd.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND TO_CHAR (tmspdsah.d_spd_sah, 'yyyymmdd' ) BETWEEN #{tgl1} AND #{tgl2} UNION ALL SELECT '5.2', 0 v_angg_tapd, (a.v_spd) AS v_spd, 0 v_sp2d FROM tmspdrincibl a, tmspdsah, tmspd WHERE a.i_idspd = tmspdsah.i_id AND tmspd.i_id = tmspdsah.i_id AND tmspd.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND TO_CHAR (tmspdsah.d_spd_sah, 'yyyymmdd' ) BETWEEN #{tgl1} AND #{tgl2} UNION ALL SELECT '6.2' AS c_akun, 0 v_angg_tapd, (a.v_spd) AS v_spd, 0 v_sp2d FROM tmspdrincibiaya a, tmspdsah, tmspd WHERE a.i_idspd = tmspdsah.i_id AND tmspd.i_id = tmspdsah.i_id AND tmspd.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND TO_CHAR (tmspdsah.d_spd_sah, 'yyyymmdd' ) BETWEEN #{tgl1} AND #{tgl2} UNION ALL SELECT '5.1' AS c_akun, 0 v_angg_tapd, 0 AS v_spd, a.v_spp v_sp2d FROM tmspprincibtl a, tmsp2d, tmspp WHERE a.i_idspp = tmsp2d.i_idspp AND tmspp.i_id = a.i_idspp AND tmspp.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND TO_CHAR (tmsp2d.d_pgun_sah, 'yyyymmdd' ) BETWEEN #{tgl1} AND #{tgl2} UNION ALL SELECT '5.1' AS c_akun, 0 v_angg_tapd, 0 AS v_spd, a.v_spp v_sp2d FROM tmspprincibtlbantuan a, tmsp2d, tmspp WHERE a.i_idspp = tmsp2d.i_idspp AND tmspp.i_id = a.i_idspp AND tmspp.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND TO_CHAR (tmsp2d.d_pgun_sah, 'yyyymmdd' ) BETWEEN #{tgl1} AND #{tgl2} UNION ALL SELECT '5.2' AS c_akun, 0 v_angg_tapd, 0 AS v_spd, a.v_spp v_sp2d FROM tmspprincibl a, tmsp2d, tmspp WHERE a.i_idspp = tmsp2d.i_idspp AND tmspp.i_id = a.i_idspp AND tmspp.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND TO_CHAR (tmsp2d.d_pgun_sah, 'yyyymmdd' ) BETWEEN #{tgl1} AND #{tgl2} UNION ALL SELECT '6.2' AS c_akun, 0 v_angg_tapd, 0 AS v_spd, a.v_spp v_sp2d FROM tmspprincibiaya a, tmsp2d, tmspp WHERE a.i_idspp = tmsp2d.i_idspp AND tmspp.i_id = a.i_idspp AND tmspp.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND TO_CHAR (tmsp2d.d_pgun_sah, 'yyyymmdd' ) BETWEEN #{tgl1} AND #{tgl2}) xxxx, trbas b WHERE SUBSTR (xxxx.c_akun, 1, 3) = b.c_akun AND b.c_aktif = '1' GROUP BY SUBSTR (xxxx.c_akun, 1, 3), b.n_akun) x) a) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset} ORDER BY c_akun

SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT X.c_akun) FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR (xxxx.c_akun, 1, 3) c_akun, b.n_akun, SUM (v_angg_tapd) v_angg_tapd, SUM (v_spd) v_spd, TO_CHAR (SUM (v_spd) / SUM (v_angg_tapd) * 100, 99.99 ) AS persen_spd, SUM (v_sp2d) v_sp2d, TO_CHAR (SUM (v_sp2d) / SUM (v_spd) * 100, 99.99 ) AS persen_sp2d, TO_CHAR (SUM (v_sp2d) / SUM (v_angg_tapd) * 100, 99.99 ) AS persen_sp2d_tapd FROM (SELECT '5.2' AS c_akun, v_angg_tapd, 0 v_spd, 0 v_sp2d FROM tmdpabl WHERE c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} UNION ALL SELECT '5.1' AS c_akun, v_angg_tapd, 0 v_spd, 0 v_sp2d FROM tmdpabtl WHERE c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} UNION ALL SELECT '6.2' AS c_akun, v_angg_tapd, 0 v_spd, 0 v_sp2d FROM tmdpabiaya, trbas WHERE c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND c_akun LIKE '6.2' UNION ALL SELECT '5.1' AS c_akun, 0 v_angg_tapd, (a.v_spd) AS v_spd, 0 v_sp2d FROM tmspdrincibtl a, tmspdsah, tmspd WHERE a.i_idspd = tmspdsah.i_id AND tmspd.i_id = tmspdsah.i_id AND tmspd.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} UNION ALL SELECT '5.1' AS c_akun, 0 v_angg_tapd, (a.v_spd) AS v_spd, 0 v_sp2d FROM tmspdrincibtlbantuan a, tmspdsah, tmspd WHERE a.i_idspd = tmspdsah.i_id AND tmspd.i_id = tmspdsah.i_id AND tmspd.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND TO_CHAR (tmspdsah.d_spd_sah, 'yyyymmdd' ) BETWEEN #{tgl1} AND #{tgl2} UNION ALL SELECT '5.2', 0 v_angg_tapd, (a.v_spd) AS v_spd, 0 v_sp2d FROM tmspdrincibl a, tmspdsah, tmspd WHERE a.i_idspd = tmspdsah.i_id AND tmspd.i_id = tmspdsah.i_id AND tmspd.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND TO_CHAR (tmspdsah.d_spd_sah, 'yyyymmdd' ) BETWEEN #{tgl1} AND #{tgl2} UNION ALL SELECT '6.2' AS c_akun, 0 v_angg_tapd, (a.v_spd) AS v_spd, 0 v_sp2d FROM tmspdrincibiaya a, tmspdsah, tmspd WHERE a.i_idspd = tmspdsah.i_id AND tmspd.i_id = tmspdsah.i_id AND tmspd.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND TO_CHAR (tmspdsah.d_spd_sah, 'yyyymmdd' ) BETWEEN #{tgl1} AND #{tgl2} UNION ALL SELECT '5.1' AS c_akun, 0 v_angg_tapd, 0 AS v_spd, a.v_spp v_sp2d FROM tmspprincibtl a, tmsp2d, tmspp WHERE a.i_idspp = tmsp2d.i_idspp AND tmspp.i_id = a.i_idspp AND tmspp.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND TO_CHAR (tmsp2d.d_pgun_sah, 'yyyymmdd' ) BETWEEN #{tgl1} AND #{tgl2} UNION ALL SELECT '5.1' AS c_akun, 0 v_angg_tapd, 0 AS v_spd, a.v_spp v_sp2d FROM tmspprincibtlbantuan a, tmsp2d, tmspp WHERE a.i_idspp = tmsp2d.i_idspp AND tmspp.i_id = a.i_idspp AND tmspp.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND TO_CHAR (tmsp2d.d_pgun_sah, 'yyyymmdd' ) BETWEEN #{tgl1} AND #{tgl2} UNION ALL SELECT '5.2' AS c_akun, 0 v_angg_tapd, 0 AS v_spd, a.v_spp v_sp2d FROM tmspprincibl a, tmsp2d, tmspp WHERE a.i_idspp = tmsp2d.i_idspp AND tmspp.i_id = a.i_idspp AND tmspp.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND TO_CHAR (tmsp2d.d_pgun_sah, 'yyyymmdd' ) BETWEEN #{tgl1} AND #{tgl2} UNION ALL SELECT '6.2' AS c_akun, 0 v_angg_tapd, 0 AS v_spd, a.v_spp v_sp2d FROM tmspprincibiaya a, tmsp2d, tmspp WHERE a.i_idspp = tmsp2d.i_idspp AND tmspp.i_id = a.i_idspp AND tmspp.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND TO_CHAR (tmsp2d.d_pgun_sah, 'yyyymmdd' ) BETWEEN #{tgl1} AND #{tgl2}) xxxx, trbas b WHERE SUBSTR (xxxx.c_akun, 1, 3) = b.c_akun AND b.c_aktif = '1' GROUP BY SUBSTR (xxxx.c_akun, 1, 3), b.n_akun )X

select N_DAERAH_JUDUL,N_DAERAH,I_PERDA_NO,C_PERDA_TAHUN,C_PERDA_TGL,N_KOTA,E_PERATURAN_SPD1, E_PERATURAN_SPD2,E_PERATURAN_SPD3,E_PERATURAN_SPD4,E_PERATURAN_SPD5,E_PERATURAN_SPD6, E_PERATURAN_SPD7 from TRDOKREFF
select E_PERATURAN_SPD1, E_PERATURAN_SPD2, E_PERATURAN_SPD5, E_PERATURAN_SPD6, from TMSPDCETAK where I_ID = #{value} and c_angg_tahun = #{tahun}

SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT X.I_IDSPD) FROM (SELECT A.I_IDSPD FROM VW_SPD_BTL_APBDP A WHERE UPPER (STATUS) != 'VALIDASI' AND c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND i_idskpd = #{idskpd} UNION ALL SELECT A.I_IDSPD FROM VW_SPD_BTLBANTUAN_APBDP A WHERE UPPER (STATUS) != 'VALIDASI' AND c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND i_idskpd = #{idskpd} UNION ALL SELECT A.I_IDSPD FROM VW_SPD_BL_APBDP A WHERE UPPER (STATUS) != 'VALIDASI' AND c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND i_idskpd = #{idskpd} UNION ALL SELECT A.I_IDSPD FROM VW_SPD_BIAYA_APBDP A WHERE UPPER (STATUS) != 'VALIDASI' AND c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND i_idskpd = #{idskpd} ) X

SELECT T.I_ID as idSpd, T.D_SPD_CETAK, T.A_SPDFILE_PDF as alamatPdf, T.C_STATUS_CETAK as statusCetak, T.A_JASPER_FILE as alamatJasper FROM TMSPDCETAK T WHERE T.I_ID = #{idskpd} AND T.C_STATUS_CETAK = 2

SELECT I_IDSKPD, C_ANGG_TAHUN, D_SPDNO, I_IDSPD as idSpd, I_SPDNO as noSpd, STATUS as status, V_SPD as nilaiSpd, D_SPD_CETAK AS tglcetak2, to_char(D_SPD_CETAK,'DD-MM-YYYY') as tglcetak1 , N_PEG as namaPegawai, I_NIP as nipPegawai, N_JABATAN as namaJabatan, C_STATUS_CETAK as statusCetak,jenis FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.I_IDSKPD, A.C_ANGG_TAHUN, A.D_SPDNO, A.I_IDSPD, A.I_SPDNO, A.STATUS,
(select sum(v_spd) from tmspdrincibtl where tmspdrincibtl.i_idspd = A.i_idspd) as V_SPD , C.D_SPD_CETAK, C.N_PEG, C.I_NIP, C.N_JABATAN, C.C_STATUS_CETAK, 'BTL' AS jenis FROM VW_SPD_BTL_APBDP A LEFT JOIN TMSPDCETAK C
ON C.I_ID = A.I_IDSPD WHERE (UPPER (STATUS) = 'CETAK REVISI (APBDP)' ) AND A.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND i_idskpd = #{idskpd} UNION ALL SELECT A.I_IDSKPD, A.C_ANGG_TAHUN, A.D_SPDNO, A.I_IDSPD, A.I_SPDNO, A.STATUS, (select sum(v_spd) from tmspdrincibtlbantuan where tmspdrincibtlbantuan.i_idspd = A.i_idspd) as V_SPD , C.D_SPD_CETAK, C.N_PEG, C.I_NIP, C.N_JABATAN, C.C_STATUS_CETAK, 'BTL BANTUAN' AS jenis FROM VW_SPD_BTLBANTUAN_APBDP A LEFT JOIN TMSPDCETAK C
ON C.I_ID = A.I_IDSPD WHERE (UPPER (STATUS) = 'CETAK REVISI (APBDP)' ) AND A.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND i_idskpd = #{idskpd} UNION ALL SELECT A.I_IDSKPD, A.C_ANGG_TAHUN, A.D_SPDNO, A.I_IDSPD, A.I_SPDNO, A.STATUS, (select sum(v_spd) from tmspdrincibiaya where tmspdrincibiaya.i_idspd = A.i_idspd) as V_SPD , C.D_SPD_CETAK, C.N_PEG, C.I_NIP, C.N_JABATAN, C.C_STATUS_CETAK, 'BIAYA' AS jenis FROM VW_SPD_BIAYA_APBDP A LEFT JOIN TMSPDCETAK C
ON C.I_ID = A.I_IDSPD WHERE (UPPER (STATUS) = 'CETAK REVISI (APBDP)' ) AND A.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND i_idskpd = #{idskpd} UNION ALL SELECT A.I_IDSKPD, A.C_ANGG_TAHUN, A.D_SPDNO, A.I_IDSPD, A.I_SPDNO, A.STATUS, (select sum(v_spd) from tmspdrincibl where tmspdrincibl.i_idspd = A.i_idspd) as V_SPD , C.D_SPD_CETAK, C.N_PEG, C.I_NIP, C.N_JABATAN, C.C_STATUS_CETAK, 'BL' AS jenis FROM VW_SPD_BL_APBDP A LEFT JOIN TMSPDCETAK C
ON C.I_ID = A.I_IDSPD WHERE (UPPER (STATUS) = 'CETAK REVISI (APBDP)' ) AND A.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND i_idskpd = #{idskpd}) X ORDER BY
X.I_SPDNO
X.D_SPDNO
X.jenis
X.V_SPD
X.STATUS
X.D_SPD_CETAK
X.N_PEG
X.I_IDSPD
desc
asc
) a) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset}

SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT X.I_SPDNO) FROM (SELECT A.I_SPDNO FROM VW_SPD_BTL_APBDP A WHERE (UPPER (STATUS) = 'CETAK' ) AND A.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND i_idskpd = #{idskpd} UNION ALL SELECT A.I_SPDNO FROM VW_SPD_BTLBANTUAN_APBDP A WHERE (UPPER (STATUS) = 'CETAK' ) AND A.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND i_idskpd = #{idskpd} UNION ALL SELECT A.I_SPDNO FROM VW_SPD_BL_APBDP A WHERE (UPPER (STATUS) = 'CETAK' ) AND A.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND i_idskpd = #{idskpd} UNION ALL SELECT A.I_SPDNO FROM VW_SPD_BIAYA_APBDP A WHERE (UPPER (STATUS) = 'CETAK' ) AND A.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} AND i_idskpd = #{idskpd} ) X

SELECT T.I_ID, T.I_PGUN_REKAM, T.D_PGUN_REKAM, T.D_SPD_SAH,
T.V_SPD FROM TMSPDSAH T WHERE T.I_ID = #{idspd}
